indicator_definition: Density of physicians, nursing and midwifery personnel, dentistry personnel, and pharmaceutical personnel per 1,000 persons
target_name: Značajno povećati finansiranje zdravstva i zapošljavanje, razvoj, obuku i zadržavanje zdravstvene radne snage u zemljama u razvoju, posebno u najmanje razvijenim zemljama i malim ostrvskim državama u razvoju
source_organisation_1: National health Workforce Accounts database, WHO. Available at https://apps.who.int/nhwaportal
